entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
